summary: An ordinance relating to the purchase of certain property required for the approaches to the proposed 1st Avenue South Bascule Bridge, providing for the purchase of additional property therefor, amending Sections 1 and 2 of Ordinance No. 76353, as amended by Ordinance No. 78557 and No. 79745, and increasing appropriation from the City Street Fund from $50,000.00 to $80,000.00.
